DOC.brief_title: Dienogest Versus Luteal Phase Fluoxetine Management Premenstrual Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Premenstrual syndrome ( PMS ) manifest distress physical , behavioral psychological symptom , absence organic underlie psychiatric disease , regularly recur luteal phase menstrual cycle disappear significantly improve end menstruation . Approximately 85-90 % woman may experience premenstrual emotional physical change reproductive age prevalence severe PMS range 3 % 8 % . The etiology PMS unknown cyclical ovarian activity effect estradiol progesterone serotonin gamma-amino butyric acid key factor . Absence PMS puberty , pregnancy menopause support role cyclical ovarian activity PMS etiology . PMS symptom include psychological symptom like mood swing , irritability , depression feeling control ; physical symptom like breast tenderness , bloat headache ; behavioral symptom like reduce visuospatial cognitive ability . To diagnose PMS , symptom record prospectively two cycle use symptom diary . Several symptom diary exist Daily Record Severity Problems ( DRSP ) reliable simple patient . There increase evidence serotonin may important pathogenesis PMS . A number selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor use treat PMS . Fluoxetine find significantly reduce symptom tension , irritability dysphoria , well physical symptom compare placebo , measure visual analogue scale . Luteal phase sertraline find effective management severe PMS . Historically , treatment progesterone base hypothesis PMS sufferer , ratio progesterone derivative hormone low usual woman . This allow oestrogen cause water retention , insufficient progesterone oppose . Gama amino butyric acid ( GABA ) produce inhibitory neuron calm symptom anxiety , irritability aggression . Part receptor , call GABA ( A ) neurone surface , necessary GABA effect , make without break-down product progesterone . The occurrence severe symptom correlate fall level progesterone metabolites . Therefore , progesterone could relieve symptom PMS prevent fall level progesterone metabolites loss GABA ( A ) enhancement . PMS diagnose prospectively use DRSP . DRSP questionnaire comprise 25 physical emotional symptom include impairment physical social activity , woman ask give score 1 6 symptom 1 = , 2 = minimal , 3 = mild , 4 = moderate , 5 = severe , 6 = extreme . The investigator add symptom score first day menses PMS exclude score < 50 . If total score great 50 , patient record two cycle symptom . If three item average score 3 ( mild ) luteal phase , investigator add score five-day interval luteal follicular phase . PMS diagnose luteal phase score 30 percent great follicular phase score 2 month . Women PMS ask take drug 3 month keep record symptoms symptom score compare documented treatment .
